citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:30pm on 9/12/24.
The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by phone and knocking on the building door several different times over a
45 minute period. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the
AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:30pm on 9/12/24. 
The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by phone and knocking on the building door several different times over a 
45 minute period. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the 
AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
